thread.title: Watch Migos Play “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Kimmel’
thread.title_full: Watch Migos Play “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Kimmel’

author: Jake Boyer
title: Watch Migos Play “Bad and Boujee” on ‘Kimmel’

organizations.name: c u l t u r e

text:
After getting an unexpected shout-out from Donald Glover of all people, Migos’ new single “Band and Boujee” became the number one song in America. And as any artist with such an accomplishment would, Migos took the song to a nationally televised stage. In this case, it was Jimmy Kimmel Live . Watch their performance below.

“Bad and Boujee,” aside from inspiring Glover to call Migos “The Beatles of our generation,” is the first single from the trio’s forthcoming album C U L T U R E . And all three members of the group performed the track in Supreme hoodies inspired by their upcoming sophomore full-length, which in many ways is like a living embodiment of the song’s title.
C U L T U R E is set to drop on January 27. Watch the music video for “Bad and Boujee” featuring Lil Uzi Vert below.

In other music news, Mike Tyson has shared a full-length music video for his Soulja Boy diss track now titled “If You Show Up.” Watch it right here .
